languages.text: "Господа, не губите! Это он от страху сболтнул! Каюсь, чистосердечно признаю своей грех — мы с мужем товар укрываем для Касбаллики. Нелюдские штуковины с приходящих кораблей забираем, а затем на другие относим. Каемся!"

"Please spare us! It was just his fear talking! I repent, I freely confess — my husband and I are concealing goods for the Kasballica. We take non-human trinkets from arriving ships and then deliver them to other ships. We repent!"
languages.original_text: "Господа, не губите! Это он от страху сболтнул! Каюсь, чистосердечно признаю своей грех — мы с мужем товар укрываем для Касбаллики. Нелюдские штуковины с приходящих кораблей забираем, а затем на другие относим. Каемся!"

traits.locale_text: "Please spare us! It was just his fear talking! I repent, I freely confess my sin — my husband and I are concealing goods for the Kasballica. We take non-human trinkets from arriving ships and then deliver them to other ships. We repent!"

"Please spare us! It was just his fear talking! I repent, I freely confess my sin — my husband and I are concealing goods for the Kasballica. We take non-human trinkets from arriving ships and then deliver them to other ships. We repent!"

"Please spare us! It was just his fear talking! I repent, I freely confess my sin — my husband and I are concealing goods for the Kasballica. We take non-human trinkets from arriving ships and then deliver them to other ships. We repent!"

"Please spare us! It was just his fear talking! I repent, I freely confess my sin — my husband and I are concealing goods for the Kasballica. We take non-human trinkets from arriving ships and then deliver them to other ships. We repent!"

"Please spare us! It was just his fear talking! I repent, I freely confess — my husband and I are concealing goods for the Kasballica. We take non-human trinkets from arriving ships and then deliver them to other ships. We repent!"

languages.text: “请饶我们一命吧！他只是被吓坏了才这么说的！我忏悔，我打心底里承认我们的过错。我和我的丈夫为卡斯巴利卡集团藏匿货物。我们从入港的船上拿走异形的小物件，之后再把它们运到别的船上。我们忏悔！”
languages.original_text: "Please spare us! It was just his fear talking! I repent, I freely confess — my husband and I are concealing goods for the Kasballica. We take non-human trinkets from arriving ships and then deliver them to other ships. We repent!"

traits.locale_text: “请饶我们一命吧！他只是被吓坏了才这么说的！我忏悔，我打心底里承认我们的罪行。我和我的丈夫为卡斯巴利卡集团藏匿货物。我们从入港的船上拿走异形的小物件，之后再把它们运到别的船上。我们忏悔！”

languages.text: «¡Por favor, perdónenos! ¡Lo ha dicho por temor! Yo confieso libremente: mi marido y yo ocultamos bienes para la Kasballica. Tomamos baratijas no humanas de las naves que llegan y los llevamos a otras naves. ¡Confesamos!».
languages.original_text: "Please spare us! It was just his fear talking! I repent, I freely confess — my husband and I are concealing goods for the Kasballica. We take non-human trinkets from arriving ships and then deliver them to other ships. We repent!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por favor, perdónenos! ¡Lo ha dicho por temor! Yo confieso libremente mi pecado: mi marido y yo ocultamos bienes para la Kasballica. Tomamos baratijas no humanas de las naves que llegan y los llevamos a otras naves. ¡Confesamos!».

languages.text: 「どうかお許しを！恐ろしさのあまり口走ってしまっただけなのです！悔い改め、己の罪を正直に告白します…夫と私はカスバリカ用の物資を隠しています。到着した船から他種族の装飾品を頂戴して、他の船に届けています。懺悔いたします！」
languages.original_text: "Please spare us! It was just his fear talking! I repent, I freely confess — my husband and I are concealing goods for the Kasballica. We take non-human trinkets from arriving ships and then deliver them to other ships. We repent!"

traits.locale_text: 「どうかお許しを！恐ろしさのあまり口走ってしまっただけなのです！悔い改め、己の罪を正直に告白します…夫と私はカスバリカ用の物資を隠しています。到着した船から他種族の装飾品を頂戴して、他の船に届けています。懺悔いたします！」

languages.text: "Bitte verschont uns! Aus ihm sprach nur die Angst! Ich bereue und gestehe freimütig – mein Gatte und ich verstecken Waren für die Kasballica. Wir nehmen nicht-menschlichen Tand von ankommenden Schiffen entgegen und liefern ihn an andere Schiffe. Wir bereuen!"
languages.original_text: "Please spare us! It was just his fear talking! I repent, I freely confess — my husband and I are concealing goods for the Kasballica. We take non-human trinkets from arriving ships and then deliver them to other ships. We repent!"

traits.locale_text: "Bitte verschont uns! Aus ihm sprach nur die Angst! Ich bereue und gestehe freimütig meine Sünde – mein Gatte und ich verstecken Waren für die Kasballica. Wir nehmen nicht-menschlichen Tand von ankommenden Schiffen entgegen und liefern ihn an andere Schiffe. Wir bereuen!"

languages.text: « Pitié, ne nous tuez pas ! Il a juste dit ça parce qu'il a peur ! Je me repens et me confesse librement... Mon mari et moi, on cache des marchandises pour la Kasballica. On prend des babioles non-humaines sur les vaisseaux qui arrivent pour les apporter à d'autres vaisseaux. On se repent ! »
languages.original_text: "Please spare us! It was just his fear talking! I repent, I freely confess — my husband and I are concealing goods for the Kasballica. We take non-human trinkets from arriving ships and then deliver them to other ships. We repent!"

traits.locale_text: « Pitié, ne nous tuez pas ! Il a juste dit ça parce qu'il a peur ! Je me repens, je confesse librement tous mes péchés... Mon mari et moi, on cache des marchandises pour la Kasballica. On prend des babioles non humaines sur les vaisseaux qui arrivent pour les apporter à d'autres vaisseaux. On se repent ! »

languages.text: "Yalvarırız, merhamet edin! Tövbeler olsun, itiraf ediyorum. Kocamla birlikte Kasballica için kaçakçılık yapıyoruz. Gelen gemilerdeki insan menşeli olmayan ziynet eşyalarını alıp başka gemilere teslim ediyoruz. Tövbe!"
languages.original_text: "Please spare us! It was just his fear talking! I repent, I freely confess — my husband and I are concealing goods for the Kasballica. We take non-human trinkets from arriving ships and then deliver them to other ships. We repent!"

traits.locale_text: "Yalvarırız, merhamet edin! Tövbeler olsun, itiraf ediyorum. Kocamla birlikte Kasballica için kaçakçılık yapıyoruz. Gelen gemilerdeki insan menşeli olmayan ziynet eşyalarını alıp diğer gemilere teslim ediyoruz. Tövbe!"
